Key Match Events: Jackson Chourio delivered a fifth-inning single that opened the door to a five-run inning, and William Contreras hit a Statcast-projected 435-foot two-run shot to cap a rally that made a winner of Brewers starter Freddy Peralta
Post-Match Reflections: Brewers starter Freddy Peralta has held opponents to one earned run on nine hits over 17 innings in his past three starts
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game saw a Statcast-projected 449-foot home run by Jackson Chourio, which was the longest home run of the season by the Brewers
Others: Jackson Chourio's.886 OPS ranked 17th of 133 qualifying hitters in MLB, and his 6.09 plate appearances per strikeout was 32nd-best
